roleset.name: looking inward or deeply into
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. Relation to 'retrospect'.

example.name: LV
example.text: In addition to being shocked , I think that we should do more , and do more important things . We should appeal [to the people of Mainland China and Hong Kong]-1 *PRO*-1 to perform a comprehensive , profound and sustained introspection .

example.name: arg1
example.text: The Soul of Chess: A Philosophical Introspection into the game ...
